topic_list.topic: Discussion about the project finance and the use of drawing board

general_query_list.answer: This meeting was about the prototype presentation of the remote control. Firstly, the group had a prototype discussion on the remote control's scroll wheel, standard place, the round shape, the multiple speech buttons, the menu buttons, and the text button with hard plastic material. Next, the group evaluated remote's look, ease of use, and technological innovation based on different criteria. Lastly, the group discussed that the production price would be 12.3 Euros, and the target price would be 20 Euros. Finally, they posed a quick challenge on using the magic pen and the board to draw design features.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the evaluation criteria.
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing set the criteria for evaluation. The group gave two points on the fancy look and feel, three points on the ease of use and learnable, and two points on technological innovation because the group thought new features were not all extraordinary. Besides, they gave two points on the target market trend which said that the products with fruit and vegetables in different colors might be popular. Lastly, they gave high marks on the room for creativity and leadership.

specific_query_list.query: What's the conclusion on the discussion about the criteria of ease of use and learnable?
specific_query_list.answer: Project Manager thought the second layer of the remote was not easy to learn but Industrial Designer responded that users would not need to pay attention to that part. The group reached a consensus that the scroll wheel was much better than average. So they gave a two on this criterion.

specific_query_list.query: What did Marketing recommend to do when discussing the evaluation criteria of market trend?
specific_query_list.answer: Project Manager thought they should skip the speaker when User Interface mentioned the power indicator. Marketing recommended that they need a button to beep for calling and they should include the speaker because it was usable and small enough. Also, Marketing supplemented that the production cost has been considered and within 12.3 Euros.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the project finance and the use of the drawing board.
specific_query_list.answer: The remote price would be at twenty Euros. And the production cost would be twelve point three Euros. And the group thought that the use of both the board and the pen to draw on the remote prototype was stupid and not handy enough.

specific_query_list.query: What did User Interface say was the biggest problem when discussing the project finance?
specific_query_list.answer: User Interface mentioned that they got the wrong information at the wrong time, and it was the biggest problem. Otherwise, the group could finish the finance discussion earlier, and they should have had discussions quicker.
